Reviews.Title: “Stay away from Blue Bayou!”

Reviews.Content: husband branson 14th anniversary jacuzzi tried caprice booked tried blue bayou tax 7800 looking hurry dumped stuff eat 10pm decided try jacuzzi started filling noticed hairs jacuzzi called office lady clean look sheet stain change housekeeper check bathroom fine awhile left bathroom noticed hairs tub floor vacuumed nastiest stayed left hadnt tired bed uncomfortable blanket mattress pad shifted night top left stairs bottom broke manger offered free night stay refused 23 cash 23 cash calling health dept chamber commerce tomorrow stay blue bayou

Reviews.Title: “No Problems”

Reviews.Content: stayed motel times experienced none customers advance reservations kept typical motel comfortable beds location stay section near outdoor pool hot tub section deal 5star hotel unless youre stay instead seeing sights youre safe restaurant typical food fresh cooked cleaner updated seafood buffet reservations weekend stay

Reviews.Title: “Great stay for the price”
Reviews.Author: aclark03
Reviews.Content: hotel price wasnt nicest hotel service amazing jacuzzi minifridge microwave beds werent terribly comfortable deal price
